segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment for unique identification of the message type, its function, and the reference number for the request.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the relevant dates and times associated with the action to be initiated in a court or tribunal, e.g. date of incident, date of hearing.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the jurisdiction and court or tribunal location for initiating the action.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a particular reference associated with the request when required, e.g. reference number for a legal case.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, A segment specifying relevant attributes for the requested action, e.g. the mode of trial, interpreter requirement.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment for free text information in coded or clear form, to give further clarification to the request for legal action, e.g. the type of complaint, the nature of complaint.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying an address relevant to the request for legal action in a court or tribunal.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the address of the incident that gave rise to the request for legal action.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment giving more specific location information (if appropriate) of the address specified in the NAD segment within this group, e.g. property name, building sub-section.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments specifying relevant details of the monetary values associated with the request for legal action.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount involved in the dispute.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date associated with the monetary amount, e.g. date of a part payment.

segment.name: Financial charges allocation
segment.documentation:
FCA, A segment specifying the allocation of charge amount, e.g. interest payable.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

segment.name: Section control
segment.documentation: UNS, A service segment placed at the start of the detail section to avoid segment collision.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: FTX A group of segments identifying the particulars of a party involved in the request for legal action.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the name and address of a party.

segment.name: Sequence details
segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment to provide for the allocation of a sequence number (referenced in the GIR of Segment group 4) to a party involved in the request.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment giving more specific location information (if appropriate) of the address specified in the NAD segment within this group, e.g. property name, building sub-section.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment specifying contact information.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment specifying communication contact channel and number for a party.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to provide a reference identification of a party, e.g. driver licence number.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, A segment to identify a specific attribute of a party, e.g. sex.

segment.name: Process identification
segment.documentation: PRC, A segment specifying the relevant process, e.g. the method of delivery (service) of legal documents.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment to specify certain measurements associated with the performance of the process, e.g. distance travelled.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a specific date associated with a party, e.g. date of birth.

segment.name: Employment details
segment.documentation: EMP, A segment to identify employment details of a party, e.g. occupation.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment for free text information in coded or clear form, to give further clarification when required of a party, e.g. 'trading as' and other legal descriptions.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying the particular details applicable to a court or tribunal order.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment to provide relevant descriptive information relating to a court or tribunal order (certificate).

segment.name: Related identification numbers
segment.documentation: GIR, A segment to identify a group of parties (via the sequence numbers allocated in Segment group 3) related to an order, e.g. all the parties that the order is on behalf of, or all the parties to which the order applies.

segment.name: Payment terms basis
segment.documentation: PAT, A segment identifying the terms of payment, e.g. by instalment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the relevant date, time or period associated with the order identified in the DOC segment, e.g. date order made, instalment periods.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment for free text information in coded or clear form, to give further clarification when required to a court or tribunal order.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying an address relevant to the order identified in the DOC segment.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the address where the order was issued.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment giving more specific location information (if appropriate) of the address specified in the NAD segment within this group, e.g. property name, building sub-section.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments specifying relevant details of the monetary values associated with the order identified in the DOC segment.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount involved in the order.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date associated with the monetary amount, e.g. date of each instalment.

segment.name: Financial charges allocation
segment.documentation: FCA, A segment specifying the allocation of charge amount, e.g. interest payable.
